property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: An interpreter speaking with a local villager, Afghanistan

note.text: Even if your work does not involve classified information, you may encounter security concerns. There are several ways to monitor interpreters and limit their exposure to sensitive information:

- Limit cell phone usage to reduce the risk of an interpreter divulging sensitive information.
- Rotate interpreters in order to limit how much information each one has access to.
